May i know about CrossOver n CrossOver game gt wat difference?

Upon downloading CrossOver 10 Pro, I found that it was unable to run games.  I found myself confused by this; as NyaTaku said, Crossover 10 Pro is supposed to include both Crossover and Crossover Games.

Upon poking my nose around Crossover's website, I realized that both me and NyaTaku misunderstood what that meant.  Crossover Pro does not include the functionalities of both.  Rather, the purchase of Crossover Pro from CodeWeavers gives you a complimentary CD key for Crossover Games.

Crossover and Crossover Games are still two separate applications.  Crossover Pro is not the functionality of both.  This torrent only includes Crossover.
Is this the real purchased version or a Trial version?
It's the real one.

Yes, you get both.
